name: CreateActionConnection
description:
Create a new action connection in Datadog.

Use this tool to create a new action connection in Datadog. Ensure you have a registered application key before using this tool.

parameters.name: action_connection_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing details like connection attributes, ID, and type. Must include 'attributes' with 'integration' and 'name', 'id', and 'type' as 'action_connection'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
